item.title: E-commerce data analysis
item.description: Hai, Di tulisan kali ini saya akan mencoba menganalisis data e-commmerce. Teman2 bisa mendownload datanya disini Loading libraries library(dplyr) library(magrittr) library(Hmisc) library(lubridate) library(caret) library(GGally) library(reshape2) library(recommenderlab) Loading data marketing_spend <- read.csv("~/RepositoryBlog/data/Marketing_Spend.csv") key_sku <- read.csv("~/RepositoryBlog/data/KEY_SKU.csv") online <- read.csv("~/RepositoryBlog/data/Online.csv") retail <- read.csv("~/RepositoryBlog/data/Retail.csv") Data pre-processing dim(marketing_spend) ## [1] 365 3 dim(key_sku) ## [1] 1178 2 dim(online) ## [1] 54144 10 dim(retail) ## [1] 181247 4 Renaming colnames of each dataframe.
